nodes.text: Level 130 was a level of Cloud City, containing Port Town as well as the floating city's largest hangar. When Princess Leia Organa of the Rebel Alliance was captured by stormtroopers of the Galactic Empire, who were unaware of her identity, she was frozen in carbonite and taken to Level 130 alongside a number of other prisoners. With the help of Luke Skywalker and Lando Calrissian, Organa and the other prisoners were unfrozen, escaping Cloud City.
